docs.snippet: President Donald Trump will promote recent tax cuts during a round-table discussion in West Virginia this week.

headline.print_headline: Trump to Discuss Tax Cuts at West Virginia Round-Table
headline.main: Trump to Discuss Tax Cuts at West Virginia Round-Table

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump is dramatically scaling back U.S. goals in Syria as he pushes for a quick military withdrawal, Trump administration officials said Wednesday, abandoning plans to stay long-term to stabilize the country and prevent the Islami...

headline.print_headline: Trump Scales Back US Goals in Syria, Leaves Future to Others
headline.main: Trump Scales Back US Goals in Syria, Leaves Future to Others

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he will make a decision about pulling troops out of war-battered Syria very soon, expressing remorse about the U.S. role in violent conflicts going back to the country's invasion of Afghanistan and Iraq nearl...

headline.print_headline: Trump Says He Will Decide Soon About Future of U.S. Troops in Syria
headline.main: Trump Says He Will Decide Soon About Future of U.S. Troops in Syria

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump said Tuesday that he expects to decide "very quickly" whether to remove U.S. troops from war-torn Syria, saying their primary mission was to defeat the Islamic State group and "we've almost completed that task."

headline.print_headline: Trump to Decide 'Very Quickly' on US Pullout From Syria
headline.main: Trump to Decide 'Very Quickly' on US Pullout From Syria

docs.snippet: Special counsel Robert Mueller's team of prosecutors has informed President Donald Trump's attorneys that the president is not currently considered a criminal target in the Russia investigation, according to a person familiar with the conversation...

headline.print_headline: AP Source: Mueller Says Trump Not Criminal Target Currently
headline.main: AP Source: Mueller Says Trump Not Criminal Target Currently

docs.snippet: Mr. McEntee, who was President Trump’s personal assistant, was forced out after his security clearance was revoked, but he will join the campaign as a senior adviser.

headline.print_headline: Aide Is Forced Out Over Security Issue,  Then Joins Trump’s Re-election Team
headline.main: John McEntee, Trump Aide, Is Forced Out Over Security Issue, but Joins Re-election Campaign

docs.snippet: A Kremlin aide said on Monday that U.S. President Donald Trump suggested the White House as the venue for a summit with Russia's Vladimir Putin when they discussed the idea of meeting in a telephone call last month.

headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says Trump Suggested Putin Visit the White House
headline.main: Kremlin Says Trump Suggested Putin Visit the White House

docs.snippet: Attorney Gloria Allred says she's no longer representing a former contestant on "The Apprentice" who has accused President Donald Trump of unwanted kissing and groping.

headline.print_headline: Gloria Allred Splits From Trump Accuser, Says Not About Case
headline.main: Gloria Allred Splits From Trump Accuser, Says Not About Case

headline.print_headline: The Latest: Trump Says He May 'Hold Up' South Korea Deal
headline.main: The Latest: Trump Says He May 'Hold Up' South Korea Deal

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump wants to use the military to secure the U.S.-Mexico border until his "big, beautiful wall" is erected.

headline.print_headline: Trump Wants US Military to Secure Border Until Wall Is Built
headline.main: Trump Wants US Military to Secure Border Until Wall Is Built
